trans-unit.source: Publishes a DSC configuration to a set of computers.
trans-unit.target: 將 DSC 組態發佈到一組電腦。

trans-unit.source: The **Publish-DscConfiguration** cmdlet publishes a Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) configuration document on set of computers.
trans-unit.target: **發行-DscConfiguration** cmdlet 會發行集的電腦上的 Windows PowerShell 期望狀態組態 (DSC) 組態文件。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not apply the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式則不適用的組態。

trans-unit.source: Configurations are applied by either the Start-DscConfiguration cmdlet when it is used with the *UseExisting* parameter or when the DSC engine runs its consistency cycle.
trans-unit.target: 設定會套用由 Start-DscConfiguration 指令程式搭配使用時 *UseExisting* 參數，或當 DSC 引擎就會執行其一致性循環。

trans-unit.source: The DSC engine is also known as the Local Configuration Manager (LCM).
trans-unit.target: DSC 引擎也就是本機組態管理員 (LCM)。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is especially useful when fragments of multiple configuration documents are delivered.
trans-unit.target: 多個組態文件片段的傳遞時，這個指令程式會特別有用。

trans-unit.source: When multiple configuration documents fragments are delivered, they overwrite the older configuration document fragments.
trans-unit.target: 傳送多個組態文件片段，它們會覆寫舊的設定文件片段。

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Publish a configuration to a remote computer
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 發佈到遠端電腦的組態

trans-unit.source: This command publishes a configuration to a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會將組態發佈到遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: The user who runs the cmdlet should be administrator on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 執行此指令程式的使用者應該在遠端電腦上的系統管理員。

trans-unit.source: Runs the cmdlet in a remote session or on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 在遠端工作階段或遠端電腦上執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Enter a computer name or a session object, such as the output of a New-CimSessionhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=227967 or Get-CimSessionhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=227966 cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入電腦名稱或工作階段物件，例如新增 CimSessionhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=227967 或 Get CimSessionhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=227966 cmdlet 的輸出。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current session on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 預設為本機電腦上的目前工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more computers on which this cmdlet publishes the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 指定一或多個電腦此 cmdlet 會發行組態。

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies credentials that are used to access the target device.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來存取目標裝置的認證。

trans-unit.source: If the Local Configuration Manager refresh mode is set to PULL, usage of this parameter changes it to PUSH and enables publication of the DSC configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果本機組態管理員重新整理模式設定為提取，此參數的使用方式變更要推入，並讓 DSC 組態的發行集。

trans-unit.source: Also, if a pending DSC configuration exists, usage of this parameter overwrites that pending configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果有暫止的 DSC 組態，此參數的使用方式會覆寫該暫止的組態。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path that contains configurations to publish to target computers.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含要發佈到目標電腦的組態路徑。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of concurrent operations that can be established to run the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 指定為執行 Cmdlet 可建立的最大並行作業數。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted or a value of `0` is entered, then Windows PowerShellÂ® calculates an optimum throttle limit for the cmdlet based on the number of CIM cmdlets that are running on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此參數或值 `0` 輸入，然後 Windows PowerShellÂ® 計算最佳的節流限制指令程式的電腦執行的 CIM cmdlet 數目為基礎。

trans-unit.source: The throttle limit applies only to the current cmdlet, not to the session or to the computer.
trans-unit.target: 節流限制僅適用於目前 Cmdlet，不適用於工作階段或電腦。

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration Overview
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 預期狀態設定概觀
